stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Very friendly and has the best interest of his students, but most of the notes he presents are borderline useless. He assigns labs and projects that are super vague with little to no explanation on what to be done. Most labs consist of one or two people who know what theyre doing (from no help of Brians) teaching the rest of the students what to do

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Brian is absolutely brilliant and is a huge advocate for people looking to get into engineering. If you need school or career advice, he\'s super knowledgeable and willing to help. He truly wants what is best for the students. The only challenge I found was misunderstanding the objectives of certain labs, most likely my own error.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: He is a good person and cares about the students. However he vastly underestimated the amount of time required to do assignments, which will lead to late nights (probably all nighters. However this is just like the real world in engineering. Not for the faint of heart but do the work and you will get the grade you want.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Really tough course, expects an insane amount of work, try to avoid if you can

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Good instructor

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Is fair marker with in class assignments, however very diffucult marker on labs and such. BE VERY DETAILED in your reports. Is consistant with marks yet still very hard.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: A contender for the worst course I\'ve ever taken. His notes were useless, he wouldn\'t solve problems from the notes, and when he did he went so fast that nobody could follow his method. His tests were so conceptual that I found them impossible! Passed, only because he curved the grades so dramatically.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I defs thought I was going to fail his course, because I did so poorly on the tests (they were IMPOSSIBLE), however I found the final extremely easy & fair, and I ended up with a B+, so he must bell curve everything in the end. Don\'t be discouraged if ur doing poorly.. this guys a genius just not a very good teacher. he knows his stuff tho.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: attendance to his classes are 100% useless considering this guy doesn\'t teach you anything. His notes are all other the place.. he just gives you an equation and makes u figure everything else out on your own. His tests are next to impossible, and this class has made me HATE physics. He\'s a very smart guy, however doesn\'t know how to teach!

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: A clear instructor in the classroom but very arrogant outside of the classroom. He encourages students too come talk to him in his office for any extra help, but if anyone does he treats them with very little respect. By this I mean chuckling and smiling arrogantly making the person feel stupid. This discouraged me and I\'m sure others.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This class was the biggest waste of time and money. Brian has no idea how to teach the material required to complete any of the assignments, and his test questions are "conceptual", but irrelevant to the material taught in his lectures. I believe that he knows what he\'s doing, but he doesn\'t know how to teach this info to others.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Simply One of my best professors

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: I have spoke with many student that have or am taking classes with Brian. I was curious if it was just me. It is not just me and avoid this guys classes at ALL costs. If it takes you an extra semester at this crap school then that is better than taking a class with Brian.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This guy doesn\'t know how to use inductors and transistors. Ask him technical questions - he would start sweating and say "ahh hmm" Remember he studied Engineering Physics for his BASc, not Electrical or Computer Engineering therefore he shouldn\'t be teaching the course.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Brian is not worth my time to type much about. If you can avoid his classes.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Really nice guy, and you could tell he was trying, but just made everything so confusing. The notes were terrible in my opinion and when I went for help numerous times I just came out more confused. Avoid taking PHYS 111 with him.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This professor is a joke. I had a major issue with transferring course credits from VIU to UVic and his answer was very unclear. ATTENTION: VIU courses are not fully transferrable to UVic; VIU does not offer the same equivalent course to UVic for in the Engineering program. Don\'t go to this school for engineering. Boo !

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: If I wasn\'t barely passing the course I would feel bad for him because the poor guy really tried, but he just didn\'t have any idea how to teach this course. He\'s a nice guy, but going in for help does nothing when he talks in circles.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Not a very good prof. Nice enough guy, but his first year teaching physics 111 (very obvious). Really unclear in explanations, notes have no relevance to the homework, makes simple ideas really complicated. Doesn\'t seem very approachable. Don\'t take 111 with him if you can help it.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Caring (1)
comments: This was his first year teaching 111, and he was not very good until he gave us a survey on what could be improved. Notes aren\'t very helpful for assignments, but you can do them easily with examples in the textbook. Tests are hard!
